file.name: smartapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    email: help@renci.org
    name: Chris B.
  description: Scibite
  termsOfService: https://automat.renci.org
  title: Automat HMDB API
  version: '2.0'
  x-translator:
    component: KP
    team:
      - Ranking Agent
servers:
- description: Production server
  url: https://automat.renci.org/hmdb
tags:
- name: drug
- name: gene
- name: disease
- name: automat
- name: translator
paths:
  "/gene/chemical_substance/{geneid}":
    get:
      summary: gene2chemical
      parameters:
      - description: Put NCBIGENE ID here, e.g. 1017
        example: NCBIGENE:1017
        in: path
        name: geneid
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An association object
      x-bte-kgs-operations:
      - "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-kgs-operations/gene2chemical"
  "/chemical_substance/disease/{chebi}":
    get:
      summary: chemical2disease
      parameters:
      - description: Put CHEBI ID here, e.g. "CHEBI:661"
        example: CHEBI:661
        in: path
        name: chebi
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An association object
      x-bte-kgs-operations:
      - "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-kgs-operations/chemical2disease"
  "/chemical_substance/gene/{chebi}":
    get:
      summary: chemical2gene
      parameters:
      - description: Put CHEBI ID here, e.g. "CHEBI:661"
        example: CHEBI:661
        in: path
        name: chebi
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An association object
      x-bte-kgs-operations:
      - "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-kgs-operations/chemical2gene"
  "/disease/chemical_substance/{mondo}":
    get:
      summary: disease2chemical
      parameters:
      - description: Put DOID ID here, e.g. "DOID:123"
        example: DOID:123
        in: path
        name: mondo
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: An association object
      x-bte-kgs-operations:
      - "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-kgs-operations/disease2chemical"
components:
  x-bte-kgs-operations:
    gene2chemical:
    - inputs:
      - id: NCBIGENE
        semantic: Gene
      outputs:
      - id: CHEMBL.COMPOUND
        semantic: ChemicalSubstance
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        geneid: NCBIGENE:{inputs[0]}
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/gene2chemical-chembl"
    - inputs:
      - id: NCBIGENE
        semantic: Gene
      outputs:
      - id: CHEBI
        semantic: ChemicalSubstance
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        geneid: NCBIGENE:{inputs[0]}
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/gene2chemical-chebi"
    gene2disease:
    - inputs:
      - id: NCBIGENE
        semantic: Gene
      outputs:
      - id: DOID
        semantic: Disease
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        geneid: NCBIGENE:{inputs[0]}
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/gene2disease-doid"
    - inputs:
      - id: NCBIGENE
        semantic: Gene
      outputs:
      - id: MONDO
        semantic: Disease
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        geneid: NCBIGENE:{inputs[0]}
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/gene2disease-mondo"
    chemical2gene:
    - inputs:
      - id: CHEBI
        semantic: ChemicalSubstance
      outputs:
      - id: NCBIGENE
        semantic: Gene
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        chebi: "{inputs[0]}"
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/chemical2gene"
    chemical2disease:
    - inputs:
      - id: CHEBI
        semantic: ChemicalSubstance
      outputs:
      - id: DOID
        semantic: Disease
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        chebi: "{inputs[0]}"
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/chemical2disease-doid"
    - inputs:
      - id: CHEBI
        semantic: ChemicalSubstance
      outputs:
      - id: MONDO
        semantic: Disease
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        chebi: "{inputs[0]}"
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/chemical2disease-mondo"
    disease2gene:
    - inputs:
      - id: MONDO
        semantic: Disease
      outputs:
      - id: NCBIGENE
        semantic: Gene
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        mondo: "{inputs[0]}"
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/disease2gene"
    disease2chemical:
    - inputs:
      - id: MONDO
        semantic: Disease
      outputs:
      - id: CHEMBL.COMPOUND
        semantic: ChemicalSubstance
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        mondo: "{inputs[0]}"
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/disease2chemical-chembl"
    - inputs:
      - id: MONDO
        semantic: Disease
      outputs:
      - id: CHEBI
        semantic: ChemicalSubstance
      predicate: related_to
      source: hmdb
      parameters:
        mondo: "{inputs[0]}"
      supportBatch: false
      response_mapping:
        "$ref": "#/components/x-bte-response-mapping/disease2chemical-chebi"
  x-bte-response-mapping:
    gene2chemical-chebi:
      CHEBI: associated_with.chebi
    gene2chemical-chembl:
      CHEMBL.COMPOUND: associated_with.chembl
    gene2disease-mondo:
      MONDO: associated_with.mondo
    gene2disease-doid:
      DOID: associated_with.doid
    chemical2disease-mondo:
      MONDO: associated_with.mondo
    chemical2disease-doid:
      DOID: associated_with.doid
    chemical2gene:
      NCBIGENE: associated_with.ncbigene
    disease2gene:
      NCBIGENE: associated_with.ncbigene
    disease2chemical-chembl:
      CHEMBL.COMPOUND: associated_with.chembl
    disease2chemical-chebi:
      CHEBI: associated_with.chebi
